intro: A free platform where you can convert your data files into charts for more intuitive analysis
intro2: Start analyzing your data with us now!
p1: Choose the file you want to import
p3: -The first line of the file must contain the header with the name of each column
p4: -It must consist of 2 columns: column 1 with the attributes and column 2 with the respective values
modal3: 2- Analyze the content and remove data if desired
modal4: 3- Your chart is ready and can be exported to PDF!
analisar: Review the following table containing the data provided and remove, if necessary, rows of information that you do not want to include in the graph.
escolhergraf: Choose the chart type you want to make!
forminfo: You can export your chart to a PDF document with additional information about it!
file: Choose an image on your device:
